vulnerability: The function totalSupply does not have any access control, which makes it vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.
criticism: Reentrancy attacks occur when a contract calls another contract, which in turn calls back into the original contract. This can lead to unexpected behavior and loss of funds. The lack of access control in this function makes it susceptible to such attacks.
